text: Graham Blakeway is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at club level for Normanton, and Castleford (Heritage №).David Smart & Andrew Howard (1 July 2000) "Images of Sport - Castleford Rugby League - A Twentieth Century History". The History Press Ltd. ==Playing career== ===County Cup Final appearances=== Graham Blakeway played in Castleford's 7-11 defeat by Hull Kingston Rovers in the 1971 Yorkshire County Cup Final during the 1971–72 season at Belle Vue, Wakefield on Saturday 21 August 1971. ==References== ==External links== *Search for "Blakeway" at rugbyleagueproject.org *Graham Blakeway Memory Box Search at archive.castigersheritage.com Category:Castleford Tigers players Category:Living people Category:Rugby league locks Category:Rugby league players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Graham Blakeway
